mapper.select: SELECT admin.admin_name, admin.admin_image_url, admin.about_admin, COALESCE(post.post_title_mmr, post.post_title_eng) AS post_title, post.post_title_img_url, post.created_date, post.content_type, post.post_content FROM post JOIN administrator AS admin ON (post.admin_id = admin.admin_id) WHERE lower(post.post_title_eng) = lower(#{postTitleEng})

SELECT post.post_id, COALESCE(post.post_title_mmr, post.post_title_eng) AS post_title, post.post_title_img_url, post.post_title_eng, post.created_date, admin.admin_name FROM post JOIN administrator AS admin ON (post.admin_id = admin.admin_id) WHERE post.content_type = 0 AND lower(post.post_title_eng) != lower(#{postTitleEng}) ORDER BY post.post_id desc LIMIT 7
